cards.title: A Colleague Like No Other!
cards.centerfold: Happy Birthday! Don't worry, I won't tell anyone how old you are... as long as you don’t tell anyone how long I’ve been here! Remember, age is just a number—like the one on your paycheck! Enjoy your day!
cards.back: Cheers to another year of office shenanigans!
cards.artistInspiration: vibrant neo-expressionist style with ornate floral backgrounds and bold color fields
